= Q: How to get the locations of agents at time t? =

{{{
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    String configFilename = args[0];
    long t = Long.parseLong(args[1]);

    Simulation sim = new Simulation();
    sim.loadConfiguration(configFilename);
    sim.initSimulation();

    sim.runSimulationTo(t);
    for (SimAgent agent : sim.getAgents()) {
      IVector location = agent.getPhysicalLocation().getLocation();
      CartesianVector l = location.toCartesianVector();
      System.out.println(agent.getSimAgentId() + " @ " + l.getY() + ", " + l.getX());
    }

    sim.endSimulation();
  }
}}}


= Q: How to get the list of agents on a segment at time t? =
{{{
  public static void main2(String[] args) {
    String configFilename = args[0];
    long t = Long.parseLong(args[1]);
    int segmentId = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);

    Simulation sim = new Simulation();
    sim.loadConfiguration(configFilename);
    sim.initSimulation();

    sim.runSimulationTo(t);
    RoadSegment segment = ((RoadMap) sim.getWorld()).getRoadSegment(segmentId);
    Collection<SimAgent> agents = sim.getAgents(segment.getId());

    sim.endSimulation();
  }
}}}
